title.rendered: Browserstack joins hands with Smile Foundation to support education for underprivileged children

content.rendered:
Browserstack joins hands with Smile Foundation to support education for underprivileged children

Smile Foundation with support from BrowserStack Software launched its education project in Malvani, Malad (West), Mumbai. The project aims at providing quality education to underprivileged children whose parents work as migrant workers, construction workers & daily wage earners who are living in poverty yet want to educate their children. The program designed is improving the quality of education through various interventions such as building basic infrastructure like toilets, access to clean drinking water, health checkups, providing teaching and learning material and setting up of digital classroom.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which aims to provide basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children. Since its inception in 2002, more than 200,000 underprivileged children have directly benefitted from the Mission Education programme of Smile Foundation.
